name: column_cat
author: AFNI Developers
description: Catenate files horizontally. Each line of output is the concatenation of each current line from the input files, all on the same line, separated by a space or a user-defined separator.

inputs.description: Print only the specified line number (1-based)
inputs.name: Line number

inputs.description: Use the specified string as a separator between columns
inputs.name: Separator string

output-files.description: Redirect output of concatenation to a file
output-files.name: Output file
